featureGroups.name: Things to do, ways to relax

facilities.name: Things to do, ways to relax

description.long:
Experience Comfort and Convenience at Song Thu Hotel in Da Nang

Welcome to Song Thu Hotel, a charming 2-star hotel nestled in the heart of Da Nang, Vietnam. With its prime location just 1 kilometer away from the city center, this hotel offers a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and affordability. Upon arrival, guests are greeted by a warm and friendly staff, ensuring a pleasant check-in experience. Check-in begins at 02:00 PM, allowing you ample time to settle in and start exploring the vibrant city of Da Nang. The hotel's last renovation in 2016 guarantees that you will enjoy modern amenities and a fresh ambiance throughout your stay. Song Thu Hotel boasts 27 well-appointed rooms, each designed to provide a cozy and relaxing atmosphere. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, you'll find everything you need for a comfortable stay. The rooms are equipped with all the essential amenities, ensuring a hassle-free experience. With a range of accommodation options to choose from, including single, double, and family rooms, there is something to suit every traveler's needs. Families traveling with young children will be delighted to know that Song Thu Hotel offers a child policy that allows children between the ages of 3 to 5 to stay free of charge. This thoughtful policy ensures that families can enjoy a budget-friendly vacation without compromising on quality and comfort. When it's time to explore the city, you'll appreciate the hotel's convenient location. The airport is just a short 15-minute drive away, making your journey hassle-free. Whether you're here to soak up the sun on the beautiful beaches, indulge in delicious local cuisine, or explore the rich cultural heritage of Da Nang, Song Thu Hotel serves as an ideal base for your adventures. Experience the comfort and convenience of Song Thu Hotel in Da Nang, Vietnam. Book your stay today and create unforgettable memories in this enchanting city.

Unwind and Indulge in the Entertainment Facilities at Song Thu Hotel

Song Thu Hotel in Da Nang, Vietnam offers a range of entertainment facilities that will ensure a memorable and enjoyable stay for guests. Whether you're looking to relax or have some fun, this hotel has got you covered. For those who enjoy retail therapy, Song Thu Hotel features a variety of shops where you can browse and purchase souvenirs, local handicrafts, and other unique items. Whether you're looking for gifts for loved ones or simply want to treat yourself, these shops offer a convenient and delightful shopping experience right at your doorstep. If you're in need of some pampering and self-care, look no further than the salon at Song Thu Hotel. Indulge in a rejuvenating spa treatment or get a fresh haircut and styling at the salon. With professional therapists and stylists, you can relax and unwind while being taken care of from head to toe. Treat yourself to a day of relaxation and leave feeling refreshed and revitalized. With its array of entertainment facilities including shops and a salon, Song Thu Hotel ensures that guests have everything they need for a truly enjoyable stay. Whether you're looking to shop for unique souvenirs or indulge in some pampering, this hotel has it all. Book your stay at Song Thu Hotel and experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and entertainment.





Convenience at Your Fingertips: Song Thu Hotel's Exceptional Facilities

Welcome to Song Thu Hotel, where convenience is our top priority. We understand that a comfortable stay goes beyond just a cozy room, which is why we offer an array of exceptional convenience facilities to enhance your experience. From the moment you step foot into our hotel, our friendly and professional staff are at your service. Our concierge is available around the clock to assist you with any requests or recommendations you may need during your stay. Whether it's arranging transportation, booking tours, or providing insider tips on the best local attractions, our dedicated team is here to ensure your visit to Da Nang is nothing short of extraordinary. For those who prefer to unwind in the comfort of their room, our 24-hour room service is just a phone call away. Indulge in a delicious meal or enjoy a refreshing drink without ever having to leave the comfort of your own space. Additionally, our daily housekeeping service ensures that your room is always clean and tidy, allowing you to relax and rejuvenate after a long day of exploring. At Song Thu Hotel, we understand the importance of staying connected, which is why we offer complimentary Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas. Whether you need to catch up on work emails, browse the web, or stay connected with loved ones, our high-speed internet ensures you can do so effortlessly. Furthermore, we provide convenient facilities such as a designated smoking area and a convenience store on-site, allowing you to easily access any essentials or indulge in a quick snack without having to leave the premises. Our luggage storage and dry cleaning services are also available for your convenience, ensuring that your belongings are well taken care of while you explore the city. With our laundry service and safety deposit boxes, you can have peace of mind knowing that your clothes will always be fresh and your valuables secure. Our commitment to providing exceptional convenience facilities sets us apart, making Song Thu Hotel the ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers alike. Book your stay at Song Thu Hotel today and experience the utmost convenience in the heart of Da Nang.

Convenient Transport Facilities at Song Thu Hotel

At Song Thu Hotel, we understand the importance of convenient transport options for our guests. Whether you are exploring the vibrant city of Da Nang or planning to embark on exciting tours around the region, we have a range of transport facilities to cater to your needs. For those who prefer to explore at their own pace, we offer a spacious car park free of charge. You can conveniently park your vehicle and set off on your adventures without worrying about finding a parking spot. Additionally, we provide car hire services, allowing you to easily rent a vehicle and have the freedom to explore the city and its surrounding areas at your own convenience. If you prefer to leave the driving to the professionals, our hotel also offers a reliable taxi service. Our friendly and experienced drivers will ensure you reach your desired destinations safely and efficiently. Furthermore, our ticket service is available to assist you in booking tickets for various attractions and activities in the area, making your travel experience hassle-free. At Song Thu Hotel, we prioritize your comfort and convenience, and our range of transport facilities is designed to enhance your stay. Whether you prefer to drive yourself or rely on our reliable taxi service, we have you covered. Explore Da Nang and its surrounding areas with ease and make the most of your stay at our hotel.

Modern Comfort and Convenience at Song Thu Hotel

At Song Thu Hotel, we strive to provide our guests with modern comfort and convenience during their stay. Our rooms are equipped with a range of amenities to ensure a pleasant and enjoyable experience. To beat the tropical heat, all rooms at Song Thu Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, allowing you to relax and unwind in a cool and comfortable environment. Stay up-to-date with the latest news with a complimentary daily newspaper delivered right to your room. Getting ready for a day of exploration or a night out in Da Nang is made easy with the inclusion of a hair dryer in each room. You can style your hair effortlessly and look your best for any occasion. For entertainment, each room features a television with satellite/cable TV channels, so you can catch up on your favorite shows or enjoy a movie night in. Quench your thirst or enjoy a quick snack with the convenience of a mini bar and refrigerator in your room. Keep your beverages chilled and have easy access to refreshments whenever you desire. With these room facilities, you can relax and make the most of your stay at Song Thu Hotel.

Indulge in Culinary Delights at Song Thu Hotel

At Song Thu Hotel, we understand that dining is an essential part of any memorable stay. That's why we offer a range of dining facilities to cater to all your culinary desires. Whether you're craving a quick bite or a leisurely meal, our 24-hour room service is always available to deliver delicious dishes straight to your doorstep. For a cozy ambiance and a wide selection of beverages, head over to our coffee shop. Sip on a freshly brewed cup of coffee or indulge in a refreshing smoothie while enjoying the vibrant atmosphere. When it comes to dining options, our on-site restaurant is the perfect choice. With a menu that showcases both local and international flavors, you'll be spoilt for choice. Our talented chefs use only the freshest ingredients to create mouthwatering dishes that will tantalize your taste buds. Rest assured, our dedicated staff provides daily housekeeping to ensure that the dining facilities are always clean and well-maintained. So, whether you're a food enthusiast or simply looking to satisfy your hunger, Song Thu Hotel's dining facilities are sure to leave you satisfied.

Experience Comfort and Convenience at Song Thu Hotel's Spacious Rooms

At Song Thu Hotel, we offer a range of well-appointed rooms to cater to every traveler's needs. Our Deluxe City View rooms provide a stunning view of the cityscape, while our Deluxe Double rooms offer a choice between a comfortable single bed or a spacious double bed. For those traveling with a companion, our Deluxe Twin rooms provide two single beds for added convenience. If you're looking for a little extra space, our Suite rooms offer a generous 35 square meters with the option of two single beds or a cozy double bed. With such a variety of room types available, you're sure to find the perfect accommodation to suit your preferences and ensure a restful stay. Booking your stay at Song Thu Hotel through Agoda guarantees you the best prices and a hassle-free experience. With Agoda's extensive network and competitive rates, you can rest assured that you're getting the most value for your money. The user-friendly interface allows you to easily compare room types and prices, making it convenient to find the perfect room for your stay. With Agoda's secure online booking system, you can make your reservation in just a few clicks, saving you time and effort. Experience the convenience and peace of mind that comes with booking your stay at Song Thu Hotel through Agoda.

Discover the Vibrant Neighborhood of H?i Châu in Da Nang

Welcome to H?i Châu, a bustling neighborhood located in the heart of Da Nang, Vietnam. With its vibrant atmosphere, rich cultural heritage, and convenient location, H?i Châu is the perfect destination for travelers seeking an authentic Vietnamese experience. Immerse yourself in the local culture as you explore the lively streets of H?i Châu. This neighborhood is known for its bustling markets, where you can find a wide array of fresh produce, local delicacies, and traditional handicrafts. Take a stroll along the Han River, which runs through H?i Châu, and enjoy the stunning views of the city's skyline and iconic bridges. In H?i Châu, you'll find a variety of dining options that cater to all tastes. From street food stalls offering mouthwatering Vietnamese dishes like pho and banh mi, to upscale restaurants serving international cuisine, there is something for everyone. After a delicious meal, head to one of the local cafes and sip on a cup of Vietnamese coffee while watching the world go by. H?i Châu is also a shopper's paradise, with numerous markets and shopping centers offering a wide range of products. From traditional Vietnamese clothing and handicrafts to modern fashion and electronics, you'll find it all here. Don't forget to bargain for the best prices and take home some unique souvenirs. For those seeking a bit of relaxation, H?i Châu is just a short distance away from Da Nang's beautiful beaches. Spend a day sunbathing, swimming, or trying out exciting water sports. In the evening, enjoy a leisurely stroll along the beach promenade and witness a breathtaking sunset. With its vibrant atmosphere, rich cultural heritage, and convenient location, H?i Châu is the perfect neighborhood to explore during your stay in Da Nang. Book your stay at Song Thu Hotel and immerse yourself in the charm of this lively area.

Convenient Transportation from Da Nang Airport to Song Thu Hotel

Located in the vibrant city of Da Nang, Vietnam, Song Thu Hotel offers a convenient and comfortable stay for travelers. When it comes to getting from the airport to the hotel, there are a few options to choose from. The nearest airport to Song Thu Hotel is Da Nang International Airport, which is just a short 10-minute drive away. Upon arrival, you can easily find taxis and ride-hailing services available at the airport. Simply hop into a taxi or book a Grab ride to reach the hotel in no time. The journey is quick and hassle-free, allowing you to start your vacation or business trip smoothly. For those who prefer public transportation, there is a bus stop located near the airport. You can take bus number 1 or 2 and get off at the H?i Châu Market stop, which is a short walk away from Song Thu Hotel. The bus ride offers a budget-friendly option and also allows you to experience the local way of getting around. With multiple departures throughout the day, you can easily plan your journey according to your arrival time.

Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage and Natural Beauty near Song Thu Hotel

Nestled in the vibrant city of Da Nang, Song Thu Hotel offers easy access to a plethora of captivating landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of Vietnam by visiting the Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture. Marvel at the exquisite collection of Cham artifacts, including ancient sculptures and stone carvings that depict the region's fascinating history. For those seeking spiritual enlightenment, a visit to the Phap Lam Pagoda is a must. This magnificent Buddhist temple showcases stunning architecture and serene surroundings, providing a tranquil escape from the bustling city. Explore the Da Nang Cathedral, a beautiful French Gothic-style church that stands as a testament to the city's colonial past. Nature enthusiasts will be delighted by the nearby Han River Bridge, a striking symbol of Da Nang's modernity. Take a leisurely stroll along the riverbank and witness the bridge illuminate the night sky with its colorful lights. For a thrilling adventure, head to Sun World Danang Wonders and experience exhilarating rides and captivating shows that will leave you in awe. Discover the captivating history of Vietnam by visiting the Ho Chi Minh and the Fifth Military Zone Museum. Learn about the country's struggle for independence and gain insights into the life of Ho Chi Minh, the revered leader. For a relaxing day at the beach, make your way to Red Beach, where you can soak up the sun and enjoy the sparkling waters of the East Sea. Immerse yourself in the ancient Sa Huynh and Champa cultures by exploring the Museum of Sa Huynh & Champa Culture. Admire the intricate artifacts and archaeological treasures that provide a glimpse into the region's fascinating past. With such a diverse range of landmarks and attractions nearby, Song Thu Hotel is the perfect base for exploring the cultural and natural wonders of Da Nang.

Convenient Public Transport Stations Near Song Thu Hotel

Located in the vibrant city of Da Nang, Vietnam, Song Thu Hotel boasts a prime location with easy access to various public transport stations. One of the most convenient options is the Da Nang Railway Station, which is just a short distance away from the hotel. This bustling transportation hub connects Da Nang to major cities in Vietnam, making it a convenient choice for travelers looking to explore the country. With the Da Nang Railway Station nearby, guests of Song Thu Hotel can easily catch a train to popular destinations such as Hoi An, Hue, and Nha Trang. The station offers a comfortable and efficient mode of transportation, allowing visitors to enjoy scenic views of the Vietnamese countryside while traveling in style. Whether you're planning a day trip or a longer journey, the Da Nang Railway Station provides a convenient and reliable option for exploring the region. In addition to the Da Nang Railway Station, Song Thu Hotel is also conveniently located near several bus stops. These bus stops provide an affordable and convenient way to navigate the city and its surrounding areas. Travelers can hop on a local bus and explore popular attractions such as the Marble Mountains, My Khe Beach, and the Han River Bridge. With the bus stops just a short walk away from the hotel, guests can easily immerse themselves in the vibrant culture and beauty of Da Nang without the hassle of renting a car or hiring a taxi. Whether you're a solo traveler or a family on vacation, the public transport options near Song Thu Hotel ensure that you can easily explore all that Da Nang has to offer.

Diverse Culinary Delights Just Steps Away

When staying at Song Thu Hotel, you'll find yourself spoiled for choice with a wide range of restaurants just a stone's throw away. Indulge in the mouthwatering pizzas at Pizza 4P's Hoang Van Thu or savor the classic Vietnamese flavors at Banh mi - Mi AA - Happy Bread. For those craving authentic Vietnamese cuisine, Tre Viet offers a delightful menu showcasing the best of local flavors. Step into Khong Gian Xua for a taste of traditional dishes in a charming setting. If you're in the mood for a succulent steak, head over to Olivia's Prime Steakhouse or Red Sky Steakhouse. For a taste of Italian cuisine, Limoncello Danang - Pizza & Restaurant is a must-visit. LUK LAK Restaurant is perfect for those who want to experience the vibrant flavors of Vietnamese street food. If you're looking for a cozy spot to unwind, Memory Lounge offers a relaxing ambiance and a variety of drinks. Don't miss out on the delectable dishes at Hue Ngon Restaurant, where you can sample the flavors of Hue, the former imperial capital of Vietnam. With such a diverse array of dining options just steps away from the hotel, your culinary adventures are sure to be unforgettable.

Shop 'til you drop at Song Thu Hotel's surrounding shopping landmarks

Located in the heart of Da Nang, Song Thu Hotel is surrounded by a myriad of shopping landmarks that cater to every shopaholic's dream. Indochina Riverside Mall offers a wide selection of international and local brands, perfect for fashion enthusiasts looking to update their wardrobe. For those seeking bespoke tailoring, Byfas Premium Tailoring is just a short stroll away, where skilled artisans can create custom-made outfits to suit your style. If you have a sweet tooth, Pheva Chocolate is a must-visit, offering delectable handmade chocolates that are sure to satisfy any craving. Vinh Trung Plaza is another shopping destination nearby, housing a variety of shops selling everything from electronics to beauty products. Nhat Hoa Silk Co., Ltd is a treasure trove for silk lovers, with a range of beautifully crafted silk garments and accessories. For a unique shopping experience, head to Danang Bazaar, where you can browse through a collection of local handicrafts and souvenirs. Don't forget to stop by Da Nang Souvenirs & Cafe, where you can pick up souvenirs to remember your trip while enjoying a cup of Vietnamese coffee. With such a diverse range of shopping options surrounding Song Thu Hotel, you'll be spoiled for choice during your stay in Da Nang.

Affordable Luxury: Experience Da Nang at a Fraction of the Price

When it comes to finding the perfect accommodation in Da Nang, Song Thu Hotel offers an unbeatable combination of quality and affordability. With an average price of just $22 per room, this hidden gem provides an exceptional value for your stay in this vibrant city. Compared to the average price of a hotel room in Da Nang, which stands at $74, Song Thu Hotel allows you to enjoy all the comforts and conveniences without breaking the bank. Whether you are a budget-conscious traveler or simply looking for a great deal, this hotel offers a fantastic opportunity to experience the best of Da Nang without compromising on quality. From its prime location to its top-notch amenities, Song Thu Hotel is a fantastic choice for those seeking a memorable and affordable stay in this captivating city.

A Pleasant Stay with Great Breakfast and Clean Rooms

Song Thu Hotel in Da Nang is a really good place to stay, offering a pleasant experience for travelers. The hotel's location is excellent, providing easy access to popular attractions and nearby amenities. Guests have raved about the delicious breakfast served at the hotel, with one reviewer mentioning it as one of the best Pho they had during their stay. The buffet-style breakfast, available as of April 2019, offers a wide variety of options to suit different tastes. Apart from the scrumptious breakfast, guests have also praised the cleanliness of the rooms at Song Thu Hotel. The rooms are spacious and well-maintained, ensuring a comfortable and peaceful stay. The absence of noise allows guests to relax and unwind after a long day of exploring the city. Additionally, the hotel provides fast and reliable WiFi, making it convenient for guests who need to stay connected. Whether you're visiting Da Nang for a short stay or a longer vacation, Song Thu Hotel is an affordable and good choice that won't disappoint.

A Memorable Stay at Song Thu Hotel

Experience exceptional service and a memorable stay at Song Thu Hotel in Da Nang, Vietnam. With an overall rating of 7.6, this hotel has received positive customer feedback for its excellent value and outstanding staff performance. One of the standout features of Song Thu Hotel is its unbeatable value. Guests have praised the hotel for offering affordable rates without compromising on quality. Whether you are a budget traveler or seeking a comfortable stay without breaking the bank, Song Thu Hotel provides excellent value for money. With a rating of 7.7 for value, guests can enjoy a range of amenities and services without exceeding their budget. In addition to its great value, Song Thu Hotel is known for its exceptional staff performance. With a rating of 7.6, the hotel's staff goes above and beyond to ensure a pleasant and memorable stay for every guest. From the moment you step into the hotel, you will be greeted with warm smiles and attentive service. The staff is highly professional, friendly, and always ready to assist with any requests or inquiries. Their dedication to providing top-notch service creates a welcoming and comfortable atmosphere that leaves a lasting impression on guests.
